Pyramid is binary linux distro for use on embedded platforms. It is primarily focused on wireless applications.

== Contact Information ==
http://pyramid.metrix.net/

== Audience ==

== Mission ==
The mission of the Pyramid Linux Project is to build and maintain a high quality, rock solid, entirely open source operating system for wireless networking applications.
